mapper.select: select num, goodCode, travelType, goodName, startArea, destination, travelTerm, goodData, price, reserMin, reserNum, assure1, assure2, assure3, regDate from gt_product
select sc_num, goodcode, to_char(startDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate, to_char(backDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') backDate from gt_schedule where goodCode=#{goodCode} order by startDate
select count(num) from gt_basket where sc_num=${sc_num} and userId='${userId}'
mapper.insert: insert into gt_basket(num, goodCode, sc_num, userId, jang) values(gt_jang_sq.nextVal, #{goodCode}, #{sc_num}, #{userId}, ${jang} )
mapper.delete: delete from gt_basket where goodCode=#{goodCode} and sc_num=#{sc_num} and userId=#{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into gt_like(num, goodCode, sc_num, userId, heart) values(gt_heart_sq.nextVal, #{goodCode}, #{sc_num}, #{userId}, ${heart} )
mapper.delete: delete from gt_like where goodCode=#{goodCode} and sc_num=#{sc_num} and userId=#{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into gt_pro_img(imgNum, goodCode, fileName) values(gt_img_sq.nextval, #{goodCode}, #{fileName})
